alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Greene; Knox; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 5:01PM EDT until May 19 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Sullivan County in southwestern Indiana... Northeastern Knox County in southwestern Indiana... Southwestern Greene County in southwestern Indiana... Northwestern Daviess County in southwestern Indiana... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 500 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Russellville, or 13 miles northeast of Vincennes, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Freelandville around 505 PM EDT. Edwardsport around 510 PM EDT. Pleasantville around 515 PM EDT. Sandborn around 520 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Linton, Elnora and Lyons. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
